spinctld.h

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 
00002 // Name:        spinctld.h
00003 // Purpose:     A double valued spin control, compatible with wxSpinCtrl
00004 // Author:      John Labenski
00005 // Created:     11/05/02
00006 // Copyright:   John Labenski, 2002
00007 // License:     wxWidgets
00009 
00010 /*
00011 wxSpinCtrlDbl is a double valued wxSpinCtrl using non native (wxWidgets) widgets
00012 
00013 It consists of a wxSpinButton and a wxTextCtrl on a wxControl and can be used
00014 as a drop in replacement for the wxSpinCtrl. It's been tested in GTK and MSW
00015 and should work with MAC, but you may need to fix the sizing perhaps. It
00016 will not work in Motif as there is no wxSpinButton in Motif.
00017 
00018 Differences to wxSpinCtrl:
00019 
00020     It remembers the initial value as a default value, call SetDefaultValue,
00021         or press <ESC> to return to it
00022 
00023     Shift + Arrow = *2 increment value
00024     Ctrl  + Arrow = *10 increment value
00025     Alt   + Arrow = *100 increment value
00026     combinations of Shift, Ctrl, Alt increment by the product of the factors
00027 
00028     PgUp & PgDn = *10 increment * the product of the Shift, Ctrl, Alt factors
00029 
00030     <SPACE> sets the control's value to the it's last valid state
00031 
00032     SetDigits controls the format of the text, # decimal places
00033         exponential uses the %.Xle format otherwise %.Xlf, where places = X
00034         for arbitray formats subclass control and override SyncSpinToText()
00035         for proper behavior when a user types in a value
00036 */
00037 
00038 #ifndef __wxSPINCTRLDBL_H__
00039 #define __wxSPINCTRLDBL_H__
00040 
00041 #if defined(__GNUG__) && !defined(NO_GCC_PRAGMA)
00042     #pragma interface "spinctld.h"
00043 #endif

00045 #include "wx/spinbutt.h"
00046 #include "wx/spinctrl.h" // for EVT_SPINCTRL
00047 #include "thingdef.h"
00048 
00049 class WXDLLEXPORT wxTextCtrl;
00050 class WXDLLIMPEXP_THINGS wxSpinCtrlDblTextCtrl;
00051 
00052 enum
00053 {
00054     wxSPINCTRLDBL_AUTODIGITS = -1  // try to autocalc the # of digits
00055 };
00056 
00057 class WXDLLIMPEXP_THINGS wxSpinCtrlDbl: public wxControl
00058 {
00059 public:
00060     wxSpinCtrlDbl() : wxControl() { Init(); }
00061 
00062     // Native constructor - note &parent, this is to avoid ambiguity
00063     wxSpinCtrlDbl( wxWindow &parent, wxWindowID id,
00064                    const wxString &value = wxEmptyString,
00065                    const wxPoint& pos = wxDefaultPosition,
00066                    const wxSize& size = wxSize(95,-1),
00067                    long style = 0,
00068                    double min = 0.0, double max = 100.0,
00069                    double initial = 0.0,
00070                    double increment = 1.0, int digits = wxSPINCTRLDBL_AUTODIGITS,
00071                    const wxString& name = _T("wxSpinCtrlDbl") )
00072     {
00073         Init();
00074         Create(&parent, id, value, pos, size, style,
00075                min, max, initial, increment, digits, name);
00076     }
00077 
00078     // wxSpinCtrl compatibility, call SetIncrement(increment,digits) after
00079     wxSpinCtrlDbl( wxWindow *parent, wxWindowID id = wxID_ANY,
00080                    const wxString &value = wxEmptyString,
00081                    const wxPoint& pos = wxDefaultPosition,
00082                    const wxSize& size = wxSize(95,-1),
00083                    long style = 0,
00084                    int min = 0, int max = 100,
00085                    int initial = 0,
00086                    const wxString& name = _T("wxSpinCtrlDbl") )
00087     {
00088         Init();
00089         Create(parent, id, value, pos, size, style,
00090                (double)min, (double)max, (double)initial, 1.0, -1, name);
00091     }
00092 
00093     bool Create( wxWindow *parent,
00094                  wxWindowID id = wxID_ANY,
00095                  const wxString &value = wxEmptyString,
00096                  const wxPoint& pos = wxDefaultPosition,
00097                  const wxSize& size = wxSize(100,-1),
00098                  long style = 0,
00099                  double min = 0.0, double max = 100.0,
00100                  double initial = 0.0,
00101                  double increment = 1.0, int digits = wxSPINCTRLDBL_AUTODIGITS,
00102                  const wxString& name = _T("wxSpinCtrlDbl") );
00103 
00104     virtual ~wxSpinCtrlDbl();

00106     // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
00107     // Public (normal usage) functions
00108 
00109     enum formatType
00110     {
00111         lf_fmt, // %lf
00112         le_fmt, // %le
00113         lg_fmt  // %lg
00114     };
00115 
00116     virtual void SetValue( double value );
00117     void SetValue( double value, double min, double max, double increment,
00118                    int digits = wxSPINCTRLDBL_AUTODIGITS, formatType fmt = lg_fmt )
00119         { SetRange(min, max); SetIncrement(increment); SetDigits(digits, fmt); SetValue(value); }
00120     // Set the value as text, if force then set text as is
00121     virtual void SetValue( const wxString& text, bool force );
00122     // Set the allowed range, if max_val < min_val then no range and all vals allowed.
00123     void SetRange( double min_val, double max_val );
00124     // Set the increment to use when the spin button or arrow keys pressed.
00125     void SetIncrement( double increment );
00126     void SetIncrement( double increment, int digits, formatType fmt = lg_fmt )
00127         { SetIncrement(increment); SetDigits(digits, fmt); }
00128     // Set the number of digits to show, use wxSPINCTRLDBL_AUTODIGITS
00129     //  or specify exact number to show i.e. %.[digits]lf
00130     //  The format type is used to create an appropriate format string.
00131     void SetDigits( int digits = wxSPINCTRLDBL_AUTODIGITS, formatType fmt = lg_fmt );
00132     // Set the format string to use, ie. format="%.2lf" for .01
00133     void SetFormat( const wxString& format );
00134     // Set the control the the default value.
00135     virtual void SetDefaultValue() { SetValue( m_default_value ); }
00136     // Set the value of the default value, default is the inital value.
00137     void SetDefaultValue( double default_value );
00138     // Force the value to always be divisible by the increment, initially off.
00139     //   This uses the default_value as the basis, you'll get strange results
00140     //   for very large differences between the current value and default value
00141     //   when the increment is very small.
00142     void SetSnapToTicks(bool forceTicks);
00143 
00144     double   GetValue() const { return m_value; }
00145     double   GetMin() const { return m_min; }
00146     double   GetMax() const { return m_max; }
00147     virtual bool HasRange() const { return m_max >= m_min; }
00148     virtual bool InRange(double value) const { return !HasRange() || ((value >= m_min) && (value <= m_max)); }
00149     double   GetIncrement() const { return m_increment; }
00150     int      GetDigits() const { return m_digits; }
00151     wxString GetFormat() const { return m_textFormat; }
00152     double   GetDefaultValue() const { return m_default_value; }
00153     bool     GetSnapToTicks() const { return m_snap_ticks; }
00154 
00155     bool IsDefaultValue() const { return (m_value == m_default_value); }
00156 
00157     virtual bool SetFont( const wxFont &font );
00158     wxFont GetFont() const;

00160     virtual bool SetBackgroundColour(const wxColour& colour);

00163     virtual bool SetForegroundColour(const wxColour& colour);
00164     wxColour GetForegroundColour() const;

00171         // NDA
00172         virtual void SetHelpText( const wxString& helpText);

00176     void OnSpinDown( wxSpinEvent &event );

00179     // the textctrl is subclassed to get at pgup/dn and then sent here

00182     virtual void SyncSpinToText(bool send_event = true, bool force_valid = true);
00183 
00184     void DoSendEvent();                 // send an event based on current state

00187                            int sizeFlags = wxSIZE_AUTO);
00188 
00189     virtual wxSize DoGetBestSize() const;

00192     void OnKillFocus( wxFocusEvent &event );

00194     wxSpinButton          *m_spinButton;
00195     wxSpinCtrlDblTextCtrl *m_textCtrl;
00196 
00197     double   m_min;           // min allowed value
00198     double   m_max;           // max allowed value
00199     double   m_value;         // current value
00200     double   m_default_value; // initial value, or SetDefaultValue(value)
00201     double   m_increment;     // how much to to add per spin
00202     int      m_digits;        // number of digits displayed after decimal point
00203     bool     m_snap_ticks;    // value is divisible by increment
00204     wxString m_textFormat;    // used as wxString.Printf(m_textFormat.c_str(), m_value);
